page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content:
I wake up in the morning, just as day is dawning. I put the sheets over my head for the light is streaming on my bed I then trundle into the bathroom, only to hear a big boom! My brother's fallen out of bed!!
I half fall downstairs. When I get down there, I eat my toast. Then smell the roast, for Sunday's dinner.
Then to school we go, even in rain and snow. First, we have Mr Holley. For break I have a lolly. The day plods on,lunch soon arrives Back in our house,the radio thrives P.T.O.
